Title: Qur’an Recitation (Qā’idah Nouraniyyah Course)
Subtitle: Foundational Arabic Reading & Correct Qur’an Pronunciation

FAQ.Question: Why start with Qā’idah Nouraniyyah?
FAQ.Answer: To prevent early pronunciation mistakes and ensure proper Makharij from the beginning.

FAQ.Question: Can adults take this course?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Suitable for anyone needing a strong reading foundation.

FAQ.Question: Is Tajwīd difficult in this course?
FAQ.Answer: No. Tajwīd is learned naturally through practice and repetition.

FAQ.Question: Will I be ready to read the Qur’an independently?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. This course ensures a solid base for future recitation.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With patient guidance, repetition, and clear explanation.

Sections.Heading: About Course
Sections.Content: A foundational, phonics-based course using Al-Qā’idah An-Nouraniyyah to teach correct Arabic pronunciation. Focuses on letter sounds, articulation, smooth reading, and building a solid base for Qur’an recitation.

Sections.Heading: Who Is It For?
Content: Students preparing for advanced Qur’an recitation
Beginners who need structured, step-by-step guidance
